text: 1:20 Rom 5:5; 8:19; Efesus 6:19-20; 1 Pita 4:16Egha nan nɨghnɨzir bar ekiam kamakɨn, kɨ arazir derazir puvatɨzitam damuva an aghumsɨzim inian kogham. Puvatɨ. Nan nɨghnɨzim kamakɨn, datɨrɨghɨn ko gɨn, kɨ zuraram ami moghɨn, atiatingan koghɨva tugh gavgavigh arazir aghuibara damuam. Ezɨ kɨ angamɨra ikiam o kɨ aremegham, bizir kɨ amiba bar, ziar ekiam Krais danɨngam.
